short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A repl interface for programming Ruby in the browser developer console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Irb Console brings the power and expressiveness of the Ruby language to the developer console. It provides a simple IDE and allows you to run your Ruby code right in the browser.
